long_desc.thetext:
Having run a spelling corrector against rev. 26, I have found these typos:
4.2.1: syntatic → syntactic (missing c) 4.4: includings → including 5.1.5: preceeded → preceded (too much e's) 12.2.9.2.3 (4x), 22.2.1.5 (1x): preceeding → preceding (5x) (idem) 5.2: souce → source 6.1.7.2, Table 5 (2x): indentified → identified (2x) (spurious n) 6.2.1: convience → convenience 7.4: Commmon → Common (too much m's) 7.4.1: CompundIterator → CompoundIterator 8.1.1.4, Table 19 (2x): approate → appropriate (2x) 8.1.1.4.14: Redundent → Redundant 8.2.3, 26.2.3.4 [[instrinsics]] → [[intrinsics]] (2x) BTW, 8.2.3: ".[[%ObjectPrototype%]]" → ", %ObjectPrototype%" <del>9.1.11: deterime → determine</del> (see Bug 3059) 19.2.3.8: deterimine → determine 9.1.11: vistor → visitor 9.2.13: ContainsExpresson → ContainsExpression (missing last i) 9.2.13, 19.1.3.6: compatability → compatibility (2x) (the last a should be i) 21.5.2.1: compatable → compatible (idem) 9.4.4: aguments → arguments <del>9.4.4: ordinany → ordinary</del> (see Bug 3058) 9.5: obeject → object 9.5.9: Cannnot → Cannot (too much n's) <del>9.5.15: nad → and</del> (see Bug 3057) 11.6: grammer → grammar 11.8.4.3, Table 33: All Unicode Character Names must be all-caps 12.2.7.2: Comprehesion → Comprehension (missing n) 13.1.11: declarated → declared 13.2.2: VariableEnvironemnt → VariableEnvironment (m and e swapped) 13.5.1, 13.6.0.1, 13.10.1: inplemented → implemented (3x) (im- and not in-) 19.1.3.5: inplementations → implementations (idem) 13.12.3: compoenent → component 13.12.12: LabbelledItem → LabelledItem (too much b's) 14.1.2: FormalParamterList → FormalParameterList (missing e in Parameter) 14.2.17: resoved → resolved 25.4.1.1: resoves → resolves 15.2.1.6: identifed → identified (missing i) 15.2.3.2, Table 36: Largerest → Largest (?) 15.2.3.2: corresonding → corresponding (missing p) 15.2.5.1, Table 37: [Dependenies]] → [Dependencies]] (missing c) 15.2.5.1.1: Modulebody → ModuleBody (b miscapitalised) 16, 24.2.3.2: presense → presence (2x) 18.2.6.1: codce → code 19.2.1.1: Funtion → Function (missing c) 19.2.3.1, 19.2.3.3: transfromations → transformations (2x) (o and r swapped) 19.2.3.6 (2x): GeneratorExpession → GeneratorExpression (2x) (missing r in Expression) 20.1.3.5: fromed → formed 20.3.4.34: methold → method 21.1.3.10: comparisions → comparisons (too much i's) 23.1, 23.2: comparision → comparison (2x) (idem) 21.1.3.10: Stardard → Standard 21.2.3.3.1: [[Enumberable]] → [[Enumerable]] (spurious b) 21.2.5.2.1: algoritm → algorithm 21.2.5.2.2: isgreater → is greater 21.2.5.7: nCaptues → nCaptures (missing r) 22.2.3.26: comparsion → comparison (i and s swapped) 22.2.5: specifried → specified 24.1.1.7 (2x): choosen → chosen (2x) 25.1.3, unnamed Table: languge → language 25.3.1: GeneratorFrunction.prototype → GeneratorFunction.prototype (spurious r after F) 25.3.3.3: compation → computation (?) 25.4.4.5: construtor → constructor (missing c) 26.3.1.4: interal → internal A.1: HexDigist → HexDigits B.1.4.1: OctalscapeSequence → OctalEscapeSequence B.1.4.1: ony → only B.2.5.1: implementaton → implementation (missing i) B.3.5: VariableStatment → VariableStatement (missing first e of Statement) D.3: ArrayInitialiser → ArrayInitializer (OED spelling) E.1: Editon → Edition E.1: occurance → occurrence (two r's; e rather than a) E.1: propertie → properties E.1 (4x): coerecion → coercion (4x) (spurious e)

(In reply to Claude Pache from comment #0) > 9.1.11: vistor → visitor
This one is also mentioned in Bug 3059.

(In reply to Claude Pache from comment #0) > 15.2.5.1, Table 37: [Dependenies]] → [Dependencies]] (missing c) > 15.2.5.1.1: Modulebody → ModuleBody (b miscapitalised)
These two are also mentioned in the not-yet-resolved Bug 2536.

(In reply to Claude Pache from comment #0) > 13.12.3: compoenent → component mentioned in Bug 3049
> 19.1.3.5: inplementations → implementations (idem) mentioned in Bug 3050

fixed in rev27 editor's draft
thank you!
